nodes.documentation:
@notice Send funds
@param amount amount of tokens to send.
nodes.name: pay

nodes.documentation: @return the total shares of the contract.
nodes.name: totalShares

nodes.documentation: @return the total amount already released.
nodes.name: totalReleased

nodes.documentation: @return the total amount paid to contract.
nodes.name: totalPaid

nodes.name: releaseAllowance

nodes.documentation:
@dev Release one of the payee's proportional payment.
@param account Whose payments will be released.

release(address).details: Release one of the payee's proportional payment.

releaseAllowance(address).return: the release amount that an account could currently claim.

released(address).return: the amount already released to an account.

totalPaid().return: the total amount paid to contract.

totalShares().return: the total shares of the contract.

userdoc.notice: The RepaymentManager accepts payments in a given ERC20-compliant token, and allows shareholders to withdraw a portion of tokens relative to their share The share amounts are managed by a Controller, which has the exclusive right to set user shares. Shares cannot be changed once the repayment process begins.
